description:
As the artist Manafest I've sold over 300,000 albums worldwide over 1,000,000 singles and toured over 20 different countries.

I currently have over 167,000 likes on Facebook and it has been the #1 social media marketing platform I've used to build my brand.

The ability to laser target your Facebook posts with boosts and ads allows you to put your music in front of your target demographic.

Facebook also just recently purchased Instagram so it's not going anywhere anytime soon and worth building your brand.

This course teaches you everything I've learned about Facebook and how together for you - to which you have full lifetime access, including all the updates, for free. (I update my courses every other month with the latest techniques)

I "take you by the hand" and "behind the scenes" and show you everything, explaining it in simple detail with videos and written support lectures.

See exactly why I'm so successful with Facebook - see the stats in the free preview videos, below).

  • See inside my Facebook account
  • Facebook ads & Boost Strategy
  • How to post viral content that people share
  • Facebook Content Strategy & Automating Your Posts
  • ... and my help and assistance to Udemy students is legendary

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
title: Facebook Marketing Mastery For Artists & Musicians
